alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued May 09 at 1:46AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT... WHAT...High surf of 9 to 11 feet WHERE...South and eastern shores of American Samoa WHEN...Through this afternoon. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 146 VAVEAO ASO LUA ME 9 2023 ...O LOO FAAAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluga e 9 i le 11 futu NOFOAGA...E aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e o le atunuu TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le aoauli nei. AAFIAGA...Feololo. E maualuga le fafati o galu fa`apea le malolosi o aave o le sami, e le saogalemu mo ni gaioiga i le sami. E ono tutupu fo`i lologa ma sologa i itu-matafaga. O galu tetele ma le maualuluga e ono aafia ai gutu o uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: A high surf advisory indicates large breaking waves will affect beaches in the advisory area, producing dangerous rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
